title: @Riot Realistically what the chances of OCE getting solo queue when it is released?
body: It's no secret OCE is a small server and we couldn't have certain queues for this reason. I fear that we are going to be stuck with solely dynamic due to this reason. Is there any information floating around the rito offices that we might not receive solo queue?

replies.body: Forget solo queue I want the old ranked 5's back :(

Dynamic queue is Solo queue.

How hard is it to understand that?

Dynamic queue is not solo queue. We are getting true solo queue back where we can queue only solo and not bring a premade of 5 vs 5 solo players. Dynamic basically fills the void of the old ranked 5's and atm is the only ranked option.
